summary:
Adobe Photoshop is a popular computer program used to edit digital pictures. It was made in 1987 by the Knoll brothers. Photoshop helps artists and professionals create and change images in many ways. You can add layers, adjust colors, and even make 3D art.

The program has a lot of tools, and you can get more by adding "plug-ins." It's used so much that its name is now a verb, like "photoshopping" an image. Adobe also makes other programs similar to Photoshop for different needs.
title: Adobe Photoshop
